column1: Specifications: "Ultra-wide 360° view lens with enhanced low-light performance and dynamic range that connects to an AI Theta Hub."
Exceptional image quality with superb low-light performance and enhanced dynamic range
Ideal for panoramic coverage of large
Includes Standard Flush Mount for flat ceiling or wall mounting
Compatible with AI Theta Pro Mounts"
"Ambient operating temperature": "0 to 40° C (32 to 104° F)"
